name: Storefront
desc: The region and unique identifier of the App Store storefront for the device.

items.name: static var current: Storefront?
items.desc: The current App Store storefront for product purchases.

items.name: let countryCode: String
items.desc: The three-letter code that represents the country or region associated with the App Store storefront.

items.name: let id: String
items.desc: A value defined by Apple that uniquely identifies an App Store storefront.

items.name: typealias Storefront.ID
items.desc: The type that represents a storefront identifier.

items.name: var id: ObjectIdentifier
items.desc: The stable identity of the entity associated with this instance.

items.name: static var updates: Storefront.Storefronts
items.desc: The asynchronous sequence that emits storefront information when the system updates the storefront.

items.name: struct Storefront.Storefronts
items.desc: An asynchronous sequence that listens for changes to the storefront.
